name: Where's My Iron?
description:
Welcome to the official Where's My Iron gamepage! This game was made as a joke/ promise to a friend of mine, though I don't need to say that as he's probably the only person that will download this anyway. 

Collect iron pills before your blood iron levels get way too low! The longer the game goes on, the faster the iron pills get! 

Features: 

"Innovative" gameplay!

Music made by me! (im sorry)

Autosave system that will save your highscore and keep it even when you close the game!
